quote: Jake's attention to detail and unwavering support made all the difference in my first competition. I stepped on stage feeling confident and prepared for every aspect of the experience.

quote: The comprehensive approach meant I never felt lost or unsure. From training adjustments to peak week, Jake was there every step of the way. Couldn't have done it without him.
